item.title: CVE-2023-4675|2024-08-02T07:31:06.633Z -- gm%20information%20technologies -- mdo
item.description:
Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in GM Information Technologies MDO allows SQL Injection.This issue affects MDO: through 20231229.Â
NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
